name: botbuilder-toybox-memories
author: stevenic@microsoft.com
description: A memory management system for Bot Builder v4.

scripts.build-docs: typedoc --theme markdown --entryPoint botbuilder-toybox-middleware --excludePrivate --includeDeclarations --ignoreCompilerErrors --module amd --out ..\..\docs\botbuilder-toybox-middleware .\lib\index.d.ts --hideGenerator --name "Bot Builder Toybox - Middleware" --readme none
